name: DARUMA
description: Inspired by the legendary Daruma doll, Japan’s symbol of resilience and fortune, Daruma is bringing ancient blessings into the modern world. Just like the doll that always bounces back, this project is built for believers who never give up. In Japanese tradition, people used to paint one eye of the Daruma when setting a goal, then the other when it was achieved. Buying $DARUMA is your first painted eye – a cosmic
